name: yahoo_finance_search
description: Search for stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, and other financial instruments on Yahoo Finance. Returns up to 15 results with symbol, name, price, change, market cap, and exchange.

steps.code: const results = []; const rows = document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr, [data-testid="table-container"] tbody tr'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(rows.length, 15); i++) { const row = rows[i]; const cells = row.querySelectorAll('td'); if (cells.length >= 2) { const symbolEl = cells[0] ? cells[0].querySelector('a') || cells[0] : null; const nameEl = cells[1]; const priceEl = cells.length > 2 ? cells[2] : null; const changeEl = cells.length > 3 ? cells[3] : null; const typeEl = cells.length > 4 ? cells[4] : null; const exchangeEl = cells.length > 5 ? cells[5] : null; results.push({ symbol: symbolEl ? symbolEl.textContent.trim() : '', name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', last_price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', change: changeEl ? changeEl.textContent.trim() : '', type: typeEl ? typeEl.textContent.trim() : '', exchange: exchangeEl ? exchangeEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: symbolEl && symbolEl.href ? symbolEl.href : '' }); } } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
